<@486477492434239488> Here' s the promissed design doc. I haven't really proofread it yet and is under heavy editing, but it is already quite a bit of a read. There is a link for the PR in the doc, but the PR is not fully complete and I would not want it to start being polluted with comments yet before I finsih it. So here is a list of documents and their status. The main design doc is  https://hackmd.io/@potuz/rJ9GCnT1C which is mostly complete, it is self contained and hopefully has all the things that <@122421399213047814> requested. I will appreciate if there are some early feedbacks/requests from that document. 

 The full PR  has the `beacon-chain.md`, ` validator.md`, ` builder.md` I hope complete. The `p2p-interface.md`  is complete on gossip but it is missing some RPC methods. The `engine.md`  has many of the new engine API methods but not all. `fork-choice.md`  has the handlers for blocks, inclusion lists, and payload atteastations. But the core of `(block, slot)`  voting and LMD weight handling is not  there yet. This will take me a little more.
